inclusion.criterion: Patients with histologically or cytologically confirmed stage IV colorectal cancer who have failed either irinotecan-based, oxaliplatin-based or both.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Presence of measurable disease by radiographic study (including CT or MRI scan, or chest x-ray) or physical examination
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: At least 3 weeks since last major surgery.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: At least 6 weeks since prior radiotherapy providing that the extent and site of radiotherapy fields are such that marked bone marrow suppression is NOT expected.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients who have received palliative radiotherapy must have recovered from any reversible toxic effects e.g. nausea and vomiting caused by radiation of fields.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: At least 4 weeks since prior chemotherapy.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Pt with reproductive potential must use effective BC
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Required Screening Laboratory Criteria: WBC 3,500/mm^3 [ 3.5 x 10^9/L]
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Required Screening Laboratory Criteria: Neutrophils 1,500/mm^3 [1.5 x 10^9/L]
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: If female of childbearing potential, pregnancy test is negative.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Concomitant malignancies or previous malignancies other than colorectal cancer within the last five years, with the exception of adequately treated basal or squamous cell carcinoma of the skin, carcinoma in situ of the cervix, or low grade prostate cancer.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Concurrent severe medical problems unrelated to the malignancy, which would significantly limit full compliance with the study or expose the patient to extreme risk.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Sexually active patients refusing to practice adequate contraception. (condom plus spermicide, or other form of birth control)
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with conditions which might affect absorption of an oral drug (for example intermittent obstruction) should be excluded unless discussed and agreed with the principal investigator
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of Wegener's granulomatosis, but is currently being treated with corticosteroid and cyclophosphamides. His Birmingham Vasculitis Activity Score (BVAS) is above 4 since the beginning of his disease.
